Key Findings: High capacity, good sorption kinetics, near‑full reversibility, operates in mild conditions; Elastic modulus mean 198 GPa, ranging 186–215 GPa across compression cycles; Mean indentation elastic modulus 294 ± 60 GPa; domain moduli 265–384 GPa and hardness 9.2–25.4 GPa.
Comments: Mn addition reduces defects and improves H diffusivity; Significant heterogeneity observed at microscale; Heterogeneous microstructure with Ti-rich domains up to 85 at% Ti.
